name: Organpunk
description:
Organpunk - Open Your Heart

What happened? All you know is that your body has been horribly abused. Gotta get this fixed, but how?...

Organpunk is a prototype made within a week for Cyberpunk Jam and is not a finished product.

Controls:

  • LMB - move, interact
  • WASD and edge mouse movement - scroll around map (starting with level 2)
  • Scrollwheel - zoom in/out (starting with level 2)
  • H - use skill (available in later level)

Team:

  • David Ryeczek - Music, Sound Design
  • AJ Marraffa - Rigging, Animation, 3D Art, UI Art
  • iwanPlays - 3D Art, Concept Art, Voice
  • LeeXx - Programming, Level Design
If you can't play the game but are curious about it, watch the  playthrough video.
